newsitem.title: HONG KONG: SK Telecom to roadshow Yankee bond.
newsitem.headline: SK Telecom to roadshow Yankee bond.

text.p: SK Telecom is expected to roadshow its Yankee bond issue in the U.S. next week, bankers said.
The company filed a shelf with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday to issue up to US$230 million worth of notes due 2007.
Merrill Lynch, Goldman Sachs, Salomon Brothers and Smith Barney will underwrite the transaction.
SK Telecom is South Korea's leading wireless telecommunications provider.
